sections.heading: Advertising drugs, etc., for abortion.797.03Prohibited acts; penalties.
sections.text: drugs, etc., for abortion.797.03Prohibited acts; penalties.

sections.heading: Prohibited acts; penalties.
sections.text: 797.03 Prohibited acts; penalties.— (1) It is unlawful for any person to perform or assist in performing an abortion on a person, except in an emergency care situation, other than in a validly licensed hospital or abortion clinic or in a physician’s office. (2) It is unlawful for any person or public body to establish, conduct, manage, or operate an abortion clinic without a valid current license. (3) It is unlawful for any person to perform or assist in performing an abortion on a person during viability or in the third trimester other than in a hospital. (4) Any person who willfully violates any provision of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor of the second degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082 or s. 775.083. History.—s. 10, ch. 78-382; s. 4, ch. 2014-137.
